text: 10 10 Tine sequired to il the token bucket = 500 =70 = 1 second So in one second, 10 MB will be transmitted and the token bucket will be full by then, and beyond this point, the output will be dictated by the rate at which tokens arrive, that is 10 ME per second. So we're left with 110 MB and we can now only transmit data at 10 MB/sec, hence it will take 110 Ô¨Å =11 seconds more to transmit the data. So, Total time = 1+ 11 =12 seconds Hence 12 is the answer.
